类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: MediumColor: Deep Navy
评论详情: These are very well made and high quality for the price. I wear a lot of lululemon leggings, and these are comparable in feel. I got these to wear while walking, so the flared leg is more comfortable for that. Very cute and happy to have them!

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: MediumColor: Everpine
评论详情: These are fun flare leggings, and I'd compare the quality to Old Navy or Aerie.  The Everpine color is gorgeous - a fairly neutral dark green, maybe leaning a bit warm.  Sizing wise, I would say they run small, so size up if you are on the line.  I typically wear a size 6 in pants, sometimes an 8, and usually choose Medium in letter sizing since a bit big is better than a bit small.  The Medium in these is quite snug on me.  Not uncomfortable, but they do fit more like a Small than a Medium compared to other brands.  One thing I love is that they're not hot!  I feel like they breathe pretty well so I don't immediately feel sweaty.

类型: Fit Type: ShortSize: MediumColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: These are great I'm 5'3 145 150 lbs i got a mediem and they are perfect lenth and size true

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: SmallColor: Everpine
评论详情: These are my absolute favorite pair of flare yoga pants! I did have to hem them but I’m only  5’0” tall. They wash well, dry well, and wear great! No pilling and they have a nice weight to them without being too thick or see through. They’re great!

评论概述: I have to cut off 4 inches.  Do women have 6’ legs
类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: X-LargeColor: Everpine
评论详情: I wish they came in petite.  Love the green color though

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: This review is for the "YITTY Active Women's UltraLuxe Kick Flare High Waist Legging, Athleisure, 4-Way-Stretch".  These pants are a good fit. They are snug but stretchy. Good material. Flare legs/bell bottoms. High waist.  Can dress up or down. They are advertised as yoga pants or active pants, but I paired them with a cute pair of boots, black cami and a denim jacket for a night out outfit. Add a blazer for work attire. Versatile.  Good choice. Good price.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: X-SmallColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: These pants work great as jazz dance pants. The fit is very tight around the butt area, with a high waist, and then a gentle flare that starts about mid calf to the floor. The fabric is pretty thick and can stretch a ton without being see through. These wash up nicely and hang dry without losing their elasticity.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: MediumColor: Cacao
评论详情: I love these yoga pants. I am glad that I brought them in several colors. The fit is amazing,;very comfortable and stretchy .

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: SmallColor: Everpine
评论详情: These are soft stretchy leggings, perfect for lounging. The green color is nice, just what I expected. The fit overall is good, but if you’re taller than me (5’8”) they will be quite short on you—they’re only just long enough for me. My only complaint is that the material isn’t very thick. They feel a little thin and flimsy, but not too bad given the price. Overall I like them!

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Cacao
评论详情: Loveeee these leggings! The color is such a rich chocolate brown, so easy to style. These leggings are buttery soft, thick but still breathable. Amazing quality! I’m 5’5 and the length is a little long for me but I don’t really mind. Perfect flare, not too much. The stretch is amazing but still snatches you. Super happy with this pair of leggings. I find myself reaching for them often

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Cacao
评论详情: Super cute yoga pants that accentuate my curves. They are soft loose on the bottom and have a slight flare.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: MediumColor: Burgundy
评论详情: I like the burgandy for a change from black, grey, and navy. These fit true to size, perfect amount of stretch, great length. The flare isn't too much, so I don't catch my feet when walking.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: MediumColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: Comfortable black flares. Thin light material. Stretchy. Fit well. Flattering to body.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Iconic Black

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: MediumColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: I am absolutely in love with these YITTY Leggings! The fabric is incredibly soft and supportive without being restrictive. The high-waist is flattering and helps smooth and shape my waist. The waistband stays in place without digging into my skin, and the material is breathable and moisture-wicking. Definitely a 5-star buy!

评论概述: Comfortable, fit not good for me
类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Everpine
评论详情: Check the color you get carefully - I thought I was ordering was black but received green. The fit of these aren't for me. However I still gave four stars since they are very comfortable and the material is ridiculously soft.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: MediumColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: I am 5"4 and don't normally get the "short" version of pants because they end up looking like highwaters on me. So, I got the "regular" length in these and they are WAY too long. Even with sneakers on. They are about 6 inches too long on me. Very disappointed because otherwise, they are super comfy and soft.

评论概述: Not bad for price - but very long
类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: MediumColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: The reg length would probably be a long, in other brands. I am short, but I'll need to take a couple of inches off the length for me to be able to wear them. Fabric isn't bad for the price. The quality reminds me of other leggings in a similar price range. Decent compression. I got black and they seem to be squat proof.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: My wife ordered these high waisted leggings to wear when she goes out for her workouts. She said they are very comfortable and have great stretch. They are a nice fit and look very nice. They are good for working out, wearing out or just lounging around the house.

评论概述: I love them, but they're way too long
类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: SmallColor: Burgundy
评论详情: Pros: - Beautiful maroon color. - Nice fit through the thighs and backside. - Quality material.  Cons: - No pockets. -Even though I ordered the correct size, there's not a lot of stretch through the midsection, and I heard a couple of stitches pop when I put them on the first time. - At 5'3", the regular inseam is about 4 inches too long (on Vine, ordering the short inseam wasn't an option), and for me, that is the biggest drawback to this pair of leggings.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: SmallColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: These fit perfectly. They are true to size bery soft material. The material is not very stretchy so make sure you order your size and don’t size down.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Burgundy
评论详情: Price at time of review: $29.99 Quality: 5/5 Value: 5/5  These are buttery soft yoga pants! The material is extremely comfortable to wear. The length of the L is a bit too long for my height (5’5) but I’m hoping they’ll eventually shrink just a bit. After a few washes these have kept their shape and size perfectly. They hug your thighs and midsection so be prepared to wear no shows to create that seamless look.  The material is quality, with no rips or loose strings. There are no blemishes or unsightly sections.

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: SmallColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: When I pulled these out of the package, I thought they'd be too small. But they're perfect! They have a medium amount of compression, which I like. When I'm crampy, it can feel really good to have compression on my midsection so these will be great. Material is soft and comfortable to wear. I do wish they had a pocket or two, but even without that, these are awesome!

类型: Fit Type: RegularSize: LargeColor: Iconic Black
评论详情: I love soft. I am so pleased with the fit and the feel of these leggings like I would order them in every color. They are extremely comfortable and super soft. I would highly recommend.
